function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Bringing sanitary and bedding materials from the capital may introduce contagious diseases from outside the local area.","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases within the local community and hotel occupants.","Mitigation":"Source materials locally to minimize the risk of introducing contagious diseases. Implement strict sanitation and hygiene practices for handling and storing materials.","Technologies":"Sanitation protocols, local sourcing, and hygiene training.","People":"Local community, hotel occupants.","Owner":"Local community leaders, hotel management."},{"Description":"Dependence on revenue from hotel nights can be risky, especially in the context of a pandemic such as Covid-19.","Impact":"Financial instability and potential closure of the hotel due to reliance on a single source of revenue.","Mitigation":"Diversify revenue streams by developing derivative products or related activities. Implement strategies to generate additional revenues during periods of reduced overnight stays.","Technologies":"Sales and marketing strategies for derivative products, online engagement with clients, and revenue diversification planning.","People":"Hotel management, local community leaders.","Owner":"Hotel management, local community leaders."},{"Description":"Joint activities with local communities may increase the risk of disease transmission due to close contact and shared resources.","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases within the local community and hotel occupants.","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene practices, maintain physical distance during collaborative activities, and provide sanitation resources for shared resources and spaces.","Technologies":"Personal protective equipment (PPE) for collaborative activities, sanitation materials, and hygiene training.","People":"Local community, hotel occupants, project participants.","Owner":"Local community leaders, project management."}]}
